info.name: JIRA Dark Colors
info.description:
This style is for JIRA's new theme change. Some of the pages are not styled yet. This is a work in progress. You do need a JIRA account and be able to login to use this style.

***This is a chrome style. All styles are not guaranteed to apply to any other browser. Need to at least be on chrome 33 or firefox 31 otherwise you may need to update your browser***

YOU CAN CHANGE THE ACCENT COLOR!!!. The default accent color is BLUE, but can be changed by clicking on the ADVANCE STYLE SETTINGS button.

Enjoy.

Please feel free to donate. Anything helps :)
info.additionalInfo:
JIRA v1001.0.0

- Shrink the browser window to collapse the left side menu. Expand the browser window to return it back to normal.

- Hovering over a card in the project board will show the card larger so the user will be able to see the entire description for a user story without having to click on the card.

- You can change the default accent color from blue to any color you choose by clicking on the advance style settings button above. Then click to install the theme. This is a dark theme so try to pick a color that would work nicely with a dark theme.

12-14-2017: Fixed broken side bar collapsing when browser window is resized. Fixed broken text color to match the theme

9-28-2017: Updated the style to use css variables

9-27-2017: Updated the theme color to blue. If you still want the old theme color you can change the default accent color to #EC407A (Electric Pink). Themed the Active Sprint Details View. Themed the scrollbars. Updated some broken theme colors on the projects page. Updated the scroll bar to accept the user defined accent theme color.

9-15-2017: Updated the backlog epics and versioning sections

9-11-2017: Updated Active Sprint Card text color. Updated the release page.

9-8-2017: Themed the project page. Themed the reports page. Made the collapsible menu fixed.

9-7-2017: Updated to have the cards in the far right swim lanes expand to the left. Fixed menu in the backlog appearing transparent.
